metadata.title: Leyiyi 8x8ft Photography Background Red Racing Car Backdrop Happy Birthday Chequered Flag Speed Racing Stripes Mechanical Motorcar Party Expressway Cowboy Photo Portrait Vinyl Studio Prop
features: This item is 8x8ft, 250cm wide and 250cm high. It’s material is thin vinyl, light weighted , so it’s convenient to carry, and suitable for any case.

This photography background can also be used in all kinds of events like anniversary, party, ball, banquet, meeting, baby shower, church play, bridal shower, birthday, photo portrait, display, wedding, youtube video making, photo broom, studio shooting, anytime you need. It can be used in any occasion you want, such as apartment, home interior decoration like wall paper, curtain, etc.

It will be sent to you folded (due to post office policies on shipping size), so there may be some winkles, to remove them, you can: a. Hang it at a tidy place for a few days. b. Roll it tightly with a cylindrical object. c. Stretch it and put some heavy things at the corners for a while. d. Iron it from the back like iron your thin clothes.

All items ships directly from our company, always need 10-18 working days to arrive by free shipping. All photography backgrounds can be customizable, different sizes, adding letters, please contact me before you pay.

When doing a photo shoot, do remember that different lighting will produce different results, so one good way to improve your photos is to experiment with adjusting the lighting. We welcome your feedback so that we may continue to meet your needs and offer you the highest level of customer care.
description: different sizes for wedding, adult, children, holiday party,personal photography background etc. vinyl fabric photography backdrop is our latest and greatest computer painted wrinkle-free fleece-like fabric.

1. Material vinyl not washable.If there have messes just take a damp cloth with water and/or a gentle cleaner(like soap) and wipe clean. 2. All backdrop will send by folded,because according to rule of post office, length of item cannot be more than 1.2m.
Below is the ways to removed the creases

1. Roll it up tightly with a cylinder, and waiting for 3-4days. 2. Heat it with a steam iron on the back of item, then it will be smooth again..  If necessary, please iron the back surface with steam iron but not dry iron.(Note: the backdrop are not waterproof). 3.We can customized any size for you(3x5ft,5x7ft,6x9ft,8x8ft,10x10ft,8x12ft,8x15ft),also we can print your own picture as backdrop Double-face vinyl backdrop is available for selling; Pls contact with us if you needs. 4. The backdrop is absorb light(not reflective,it will be different when taking pictures with photos).
The backdrops need keep distance to take pictures. Also many large format images may seem a little pixelated. Please keep in mind that all computer screens vary in color calibration.
